question: Which Indian documentary film won the audience award at the Sundance Film Festival 2021?
explanation:
An Indian documentary film titled “Writing with Fire”, won the audience award in the World Cinema Documentary category at the Sundance Film Festival 2021.
The film narrates the rise of India’s only newspaper run by Dalit women, the ‘Khabar Lahariya’. The festival is presented by US-based Sundance non-profit institute, which has been recognising independent artists across the world.
